body.subject: Acknowledged: Epic 28 approved, release_gate: true, deployment unblocked
body.summary: Acknowledged final quality review approval for Epic 28. Release gate: true, deployment unblocked. Plan.json successfully executed - all 8 workstreams (18 tasks) completed with excellent quality. All quality gates passed: coverage 85% unit, 80% integration, test evidence complete, architecture compliant, security validated, performance targets met, all 12 AC covered. Deployment can proceed per deployment.json with staged rollout.
key_points: Epic 28 approved: release_gate: true, deployment unblocked
Plan.json execution successful: all 8 workstreams (18 tasks) completed per plan
Quality gates passed: coverage 85% unit, 80% integration (exceeds 80% requirement), test evidence complete (91 unit, 25 integration, 7 security, 3 performance, 5 smoke tests)
Architecture compliant: Clean Architecture verified, no layer boundary violations
Security validated: input sanitization tests pass, no external SaaS dependencies
Performance targets met: memory < 150ms, intent < 5s, multi-step < 30s
CI gates satisfied: MyPy passes, linting passes
body.action_needed: No action needed. Deployment can proceed. DevOps will unblock deployment per deployment.json and start staged rollout (staging → canary → production). Monitor production metrics: god_agent_tasks_total, god_agent_plan_duration_seconds, god_agent_veto_total, god_agent_skill_latency_seconds.
